pr_title: iOS - Hide trends option with empty charts list.

timeline.message: Hide trends with empty charts list.

timeline.bodyText: can you please explain how this results in trends to be hidden?
timeline.author: zohrehj

replies.bodyText: Trends button is rendering in the last section. The existing implementation had tableViewRowDetails.count + 1 passed as total sections to show trends at the end. I've added a condition to reduce the sections by 1 so that it doesn't show the trends section.
replies.author: tushar-boston
